sentences.english: A couple point out sites on massive map along a wall in Mount Kumgang resort.
sentences.chinese: 一對姐妹在金剛山景區巨幅地圖前找位置。

sentences.english: DPRK to freeze S. Korea's assets in Mt. Kumgang.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮將凍結韓國當局在金剛山地區資產。

sentences.english: A Chinese tourist poses near mountains peaks at the Kumgang mountain resort in North Korea.
sentences.chinese: 一箇中國遊客在朝鮮金剛山山頂附近留影。

sentences.english: A flock of spectacled teals soars over Geumgang Lake in Gunsan, South Korea.
sentences.chinese: 一羣銅翅水雉在金剛山湖面掠過，韓國。
